Bless/Buff: Magic Resistance
 
(Affects Demons and Undead [demonundead], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], Magic Resistance Negates Easily [mrnegateseasily], No effect on Demons [demonimmune])
With this prayer, a Tomb King grants magic resistance to most of his undead subjects. This extra magic resistance is very useful if the enemy has priests that can banish the undead.
